DOC.brief_summary: The Alzheimer 's Prevention Registry ( www.endALZnow.org ) collect contact demographic information individual . The objective provide information late news advance Alzheimer 's prevention research , inform enrollee research study community . Enrolled individual receive regular email communication . As research study become available , individual notify via email information proceed interested . Registry enrollees obligation participate research study . Study opportunity may include survey , healthy lifestyle intervention ( e.g. , diet , exercise ) , memory & thinking test , brain scan , investigational drug trial . To join Registry , please visit www.endALZnow.org
